mapper.select: select emp_no , emp_name , m.dept_no , upper_no , dept_name , job_name from member m left join department d on (m.dept_no = d.dept_no) join job j on (m.job_no = j.job_no) where status = 'Y' order by m.job_no
select dept_no , dept_name , upper_no from department
select emp_no , emp_name , dept_name , job_name from member join department using (dept_no) join job using (job_no) where emp_no = #{empNo}
